summary:
Adds a new 2 handed dawnguard battleaxe.
REQUIRES DAWNGUARD DLC.
descriptionHtml:
[u][size=5]REQUIRES DAWNGUARD DLC![/size][/u]

Add a two-handed Dawnguard battleaxe. You can find a few of them around the castle.
The weapon can be tempered with 1 steel ingot.

If you have any retextures of the Dawnguard warhammer and axe they will also be applied to this weapon.

NOTE: this mod is potentially not compatible with any mod that modifies the interior of the fort.



[b]Check my other mods[/b]
